history.text: Hi. Love this movie. As stated old yet new.
Yes, I really like Robert Downey Jr.
Me too. Mark Ruffalo was a nice surprise as the Hulk.
Yes he was. I have always enjoyed Marvel comics.
And they do the best job at adapting the comics to the movies. All MCU is better than DC.
I agree. I had no idea Disney distributed the film. That makes me like it even more. I am also a Disney fan.
Love classic Disney for sure.  disney is not my main interest but love Marvel and their movies, especially the Avengers series.

Scarlett Johansson was really great as Natasha. I've always really liked Scarlett Johansson and the N
atasha character.
Yes. Samuel L. Jackson was a nice surprise as well.

uid2response.feedback: The other user left the chat before we completed the 4 documents. I think he may have thought you only needed 3 responses, but really the instructions said to have 3 responses on all 4 documents. You should make the instructions more clear because this is the second time I have done this HIT where the other person had no clue what we were supposed to be doing and left the chat early.
